name: Mail Crasher
description:
An evil wizard has stolen a legendary plate mail with magic powers! A great hero (YOU!) traveled far to the land of evil to defeat the wizard and retrieve the armor. Will the quest be a success? Beat the game to find out!

---

This was a game that I made back in late 2016 to see how fast I can complete a game project without any prior planning or refining. Took me about two weeks.
